meanings.definition: A restriction or rule that controls what someone can do.
meanings.sent1: The teacher set a limitation on how much candy the students could eat.
meanings.sent2: There is a limitation on the number of guests allowed in the party.
meanings.sent3: The limitation on screen time made the kids get creative with their playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of heights was a limitation she had to overcome to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The limitation on water usage during the drought was crucial for conservation efforts.

meanings.definition: The act of controlling or reducing something.
meanings.sent1: The limitation of sugar intake is important for a healthy diet.
meanings.sent2: The limitation of noise pollution in the city is a priority for urban planners.
meanings.sent3: The limitation of TV time helped the family spend more quality time together.
meanings.sent4: The limitation of resources in the village required careful planning.
meanings.sent5: The limitation of speed on the road is necessary for safety.

meanings.sent1: His injury imposed a limitation on his ability to run.
meanings.sent2: The limitation of memory capacity in older adults is a common concern.
meanings.sent3: The limitation of space in the tiny apartment led to creative storage solutions.
meanings.sent4: The limitation of imagination can hinder problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent5: The limitation of time made it challenging to complete the project on schedule.
